definition: sweet and hot varieties of fruits of plants of the genus Capsicum, attack and bombard with or as if with missiles
details:
noun
- sweet and hot varieties of fruits of plants of the genus Capsicum
- pungent seasoning from the berry of the common pepper plant of East India
= synonyms: peppercorn
- any of various tropical plants of the genus Capsicum bearing peppers
= synonyms: capsicum, capsicum pepper plant
- climber having dark red berries (peppercorns) when fully ripe
= synonyms: black pepper, white pepper, common pepper
verb
- attack and bombard with or as if with missiles
= synonyms: pelt
- add pepper to
= example: add pepper to
